text: Božo Koprivica () is an essayist, dramatic adviser and literary critic from Montenegro, self-styled as being of Yugoslavian ethnicity. He is best known for his books Volej i sluh (from 1992) and Kiš, Borhes i Maradona (from 1996), which reached cult status.Kako čitati esej (in Montenegrin). Pobjeda. V.S.; 3 August 2006 Koprivica lives and works in Belgrade, the capital city of Serbia. He has been a good friend of the eminent Yugoslav novelist and short story writer Danilo Kiš.Književnost nije moj prvi dar, moj prvi dar je lopta (in Serbian). Plastelin.
